description: Fix task directory paths, base_branch auto-detection, and migration bug

changelog.description: Correct task directory path in dispatch.md and plan.md (was .trellis/workspace/{dev}/tasks/, now .trellis/tasks/)
Remove hardcoded 'taosu' in status.sh help example
Auto-record current branch as base_branch when creating task, so PR targets correct branch
Remove unsupported 'update' migration type that caused 'path argument undefined' error
Add set-base-branch command to manually override PR target branch

notes: Key fix: When user creates a task on branch A, base_branch is now automatically set to A. Worktree creates feature branch based on A, and PR will target A.
